settimer.description: Hours are very different in various places in the world, for this there is this command, you can change the time of your server, this will only influence the aesthetics of the places, leaving them with periods of day and night!
settimer.success: \â° Guild time has been updated successfully!

hour.description: Look the current time following the configuration of this guild!

calculate.description: Calculate price to upgrade your storage!

ping.description: Bot connection data with the servers.

team.description: Team that develops the bot, and makes it increasingly amazing!

collect.description: To collect all your resources produced
collect.err: your production is not ready yet, wait {{ min }} minutes to collect again.
collect.attacked:
**Your plantation has been attacked by birds and wildlife!
His loss was ``{{- attack }}%``!**
collect.noStorage: Some of your stores are full! empty to collect your new resources.!

list.description: List of products you can buy in the market!
scarecrow:
A cloth scarecrow that will protect your plantation from bird attacks!
**ID: ``SF``
Price: ``$300``
Duration: ``2 days``
Requires: ``Farm Level 4``**
fence:
A wooden fence that prevents wildlife from entering your plantation!
**ID: ``FF``
Price: ``$300``
Duration: ``2 days``
Requires: ``Farm Level 4``**
fertilizer:
A more basic fertilizer to help with your crop, ensures an increase of ``5%`` to ``25%``!
**ID: ``BF``
Price: ``2 Lilistars``
Duration: ``5 uses``
Requires: ``Farm Level 2``**

A medium fertilizer that ensures a reasonable increase of  ``15%`` to ``35%`` on your farm!
**ID: ``MF``
Price: ``4 Lilistars``
Duration: ``5 uses``
Requires: ``Farm Level 3``**

The best of Fertilizers, ensures a increase of ``25%`` to ``50%`` in your crop!
**ID: ``PF``
Price: ``6 Lilistars``
Duration: ``4 uses``
Requires: ``Farm Level 3``**
baits:
A basic fishing box with some baits, ensures improved of ``5%`` to ``10%`` in your fishing!
**ID: ``BB``
Price: ``2 Lilistars``
Duration: ``5 uses``
Requires: ``Fishing Level 2``**

A fishing box with reasonable baits, ensures improved of ``10%`` to ``20%`` in your fishing!
**ID: ``MB``
Price: ``4 Lilistars``
Duration: ``4 uses``
Requires: ``Fishing Level 3``**

The best baits for attracting fish, ensures improved of ``15%`` to ``30%`` in your fishing!
**ID: ``PB``
Price: ``6 Lilistars``
Duration: ``4 uses``
Requires: ``Fishing Level 3``**
energetic:
A simple energetic will help you in your mining, ensuring performance of ``5%`` to ``10%``!
**ID: ``BE``
Price: ``2 Lilistars``
Duration: ``5 uses``
Requires: ``Mining Level 2``**

A energetic improved that increase your performance in ``10%`` to ``15%``!
**ID: ``ME``
Price: ``4 Lilistars``
Duration: ``4 uses``
Requires: ``Mining Level 3``**

The energetic powerful that will bring a lot of energy to your explorations, ensures improved ``15%`` to ``25%``!
**ID: ``PE``
Price: ``6 Lilistars``
Duration: ``4 uses``
Requires: ``Mining Level 3``**

market.description: Buy some special products in this market!
market.error: type correctly the product ID you wish to purchase! To see the products use the command ``list``

sell.description: Sale what was produced to make money

upgrade.maxLevel: You already at the maximum level at this place
upgrade.noMoney: you enough money to buy this upgrade! Missing: {{- remainder }}
upgrade.protection:
\ğŸŒ³ Congratulations your Farm is growing, but it attracts attention from unwanted animals, your plantation can be attacked while you are away! 

Buy protection using command ``market``, prices are in command ``list``
upgrade.job:
\ğŸ’¼ Congratulations, your economy is growing well, so now you can specialize in a profession, and get benefits from it!

Use the ``job`` command to adjust your profession, jobs and more details to use ``job list``

unlock.fishing: Congratulations, you have unlocked a new location! Now get your fishing rod and let's go fishing! \â›µ

daily.description: One lilistar you can catch every 20 hours! You can buy special things with these Lilistars.

delete.description: Delete your Guild (by executing you confirm that you want this, this action is irreversible!)

invite.description: Create or remove an invite in your Guild!
invite.notPrivate: This command is intended for private guilds, other users can currently join without invitation in your guild!
invite.already: This user has previously been invited to this Guild!
invite.limit: invitation limit in this guild has been reached, clear them to create another!
invite.noInvited: invitation not found or previously removed!
invite.requireMention: Mention the user you want to invite or remove from list!
invite.added: \ğŸ“§ Invitation successfully added! user can enter your guild using the command ``join``
invite.noList: This user is not in your guest list!
invite.notAction: type the action correctly for the command to execute! `[create, delete, list]`

kick.description: Kick a member of your Guild!
kick.error: type the user id correctly to kick him out of his guild
kick.self: you can't expel yourself, if you want to leave your guild, use the command ``leave``
kick.owner: you can't kick the guild owner
kick.mod: you can't kick out other moderators
kick.member: member not found in your guild!
kick.success: \âŒ Member was successfully kicked out of his Guild!

levelup.noMoney: your Guild does not have the amount of money needed to level up!

private.true: \ğŸ” Your guild is now private, only members you invite can join!
private.false: \ğŸ”“ Now your guild is public, any user can join!

months.description: Look duration of the seasons and the effects it has on your production.
months.duration:
January, May and September, it's ``Spring``.
February, June and October, it's ``Summer``.
March, June and November, it's ``Autumn``.
April, August and December, it's ``Winter``.

All season dates are ``fictitious``, made to be used inside the Bot.
months.increase: will increase {{- value }}% in your production.
months.decrease: will decrease {{- value }}% in your production.

give.description: Give money to other users or friends!

give.noUser: mention the user you want to give the money to!
give.overhalf: you cannot give more than half of what you own to another user!

give.success:
{{- Rname }}, {{- Gname }} gave you ``${{ money }}``!
**Tax: `{{ tax }}%`**
**Total received: `${{ total }}`**
